x_symbol.description: Assign DOM0 event handlers. For each N do: xGetElementById(idN)[ev] = fnN

par.name: ev
par.note: The DOM0 event property name, for example: onclick, onmouseover, etc.

par.name: idN
par.note: Provide ID strings or element references as 2nd, 4th, etc. arguments.

x_symbol.return: The number of handlers added successfully.

rev.author: mf
rev.note: Initial release but something I've been using for a long time.
